Contributor: Kaiser, Augustus, artist.; Wynkoop Hallenbeck Crawford Co., printer.; Seventy-seventh Armored Division Association (U.S.);
Note: Signed "Lt. Augustus Kaiser." Date based on America's participation in the war. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text tells of the Argonne Conquerors. The illustration shows a large green figure of a man standing large above tiny size troops on the battlefield. The illustration is from the official history, designed and written in the Field, France.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.

Title: Welcome 77th
